{{cpp/chrono/title|operator&lt;&lt;{{small|(std::chrono::month)}}}}
{{cpp/chrono/month/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=chrono|since=c++20|
template&lt; class CharT, class Traits &gt;
std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp;
    operator&lt;&lt;( std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp; os, const std::chrono::month&amp; m );
}}

If {{c|!m.ok()}}, inserts {{c|unsigned(m)}} followed by {{c|" is not a valid month"}} to {{c|os}}. Otherwise, forms a {{c|std::basic_string&lt;CharT&gt;}} {{c|s}} consisting of the abbreviated month name for the month represented by {{c|m}}, determined using the locale associated with {{c|os}}, and inserts {{c|s}} into {{c|os}}.

Equivalent to

{{cc|
return os &lt;&lt; (m.ok() ?
    std::format(os.getloc(), STATICALLY_WIDEN&lt;CharT&gt;("{:L%b}"), m) :
    std::format(os.getloc(), STATICALLY_WIDEN&lt;CharT&gt;("{} is not a valid month"), unsigned(m)));
}}

where {{c|STATICALLY_WIDEN&lt;CharT&gt;("...")}} is {{c|"..."}} if {{tt|CharT}} is {{c|char}}, and {{c|L"..."}} if {{tt|CharT}} is {{c|wchar_t}}.

===Return value===
{{c|os}}

===Notes===
This {{c|operator&lt;&lt;}} is primarily intended for debugging use. For control over formatting, use {{lc|std::format}}.
